title: Bhashwara Gunaratne appointed as new SLTDA Chairman
content: Bhashwara Senanka Gunarathna, Chairman of Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau was appointed as the new Chairman of the Sri Lanka Tourism Development Authority with immediate effect. Bashwara Gunarathna will also remain as the Chairman of the Sri Lanka Tourism Promotion Bureau (SLTPB).  At present he is also working as a Director General, Development Forum Office…
